request.description:
This endpoint creates an API. The ID will be generated by the server. ### Parameters *name*: This is the name of the API. (Required)
*summary*: This is a short summary that describes the API. (Optional)
*description*: This is a long description that can support markdown. (Optional)
*workspace*: The workspace ID in which the API is supposed to be created in. (Required)
*versions*: Array of versions that are to be created for this API. If no versions are provided, a default version "0.1" will be created for you. (Optional)
